name: Loreley
desc:
Merrily we sailed Though the waves were plenty Down the twisting Rhine Following a ... Legend's faded storyline Tried to us all Oh, called her "Loreley" Careful or you'll ... Oh, the stories we were Quite a vision to behold Mysteries of the in her eyes of gold... Laying on the silver stone, such a lonely sight Barnacles become a , my poor Loreley... REF: And the would cry, and many would die And all the waves would down to the Loreley... (x2) You would not believe your eyes, how a could hypnotize Promises are only from Loreley In a shade of mossy green, seashell in her She was born the queen, ne'er to grace the land... REF
Oh, the song of Loreley Charms the right from the sky... She will get inside your , loveley Loreley... When she cries "Be with me the end of time" You know you ever be with your Loreley... REF
